Release notes release/0.8.5
===========================

Released 2018-10-21

Changes
~~~~~~~

-  Merge pull request #73 from miraculixx/patrick/fix-release-v1.2
   `e93f3f7 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/e93f3f7>`__
-  Merge pull request #71 from miraculixx/patrick/add-apply-stats
   `1410f68 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/1410f68>`__
-  Merge pull request #70 from miraculixx/patrick/site-redeploy
   `ebc0879 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/ebc0879>`__
-  enable more statistics
   `2a8b6aa <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/2a8b6aa>`__
-  update docker image release build
   `cb12a39 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/cb12a39>`__
-  add more documentation
   `29b6412 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/29b6412>`__
-  update gitignore
   `01b8e9e <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/01b8e9e>`__
-  extend tests to check omegaml setup works
   `20fc528 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/20fc528>`__
-  Merge pull request #68 from miraculixx/patrick/extend-docs-tutorial
   `5b3733c <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/5b3733c>`__
-  setup sign up behave test
   `64e273e <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/64e273e>`__
-  Merge pull request #67 from miraculixx/patrick/enable-applyfn
   `354b0e9 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/354b0e9>`__
-  add documentation update docs
   `310a847 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/310a847>`__
-  Merge pull request #65 from miraculixx/patrick/add-visualizations
   `08cbd41 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/08cbd41>`__
-  enable apply-style functions enable caching support for apply
   complete apply tests add documentation
   `60465dd <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/60465dd>`__
-  variuos performance improvements add job slides viewer fix large
   scale insertion timeout
   `dc7bd3e <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/dc7bd3e>`__

Bug Fixes
~~~~~~~~~

-  fixed to work with new pip and mongodb versions
   `69e78b0 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/69e78b0>`__

   `65c3c93 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/65c3c93>`__
